member.name: F:Dynamicweb.Content.Social.Adapters.ExternalAuthentication.FacebookLoginProvider.facebookAuthenticationOptions
member.remarks: It is needed to assign some values to the AppId and AppSecret properties for the successful initialization of Facebook provider at OwinStartup Configuration Example: AppId - "689541271064314" and AppSecret - "27a5b797b6ca46c6b4ae0058dbd51861"

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Content.Social.Adapters.ExternalAuthentication.FacebookLoginProvider.Login
member.remarks: Change Facebook Authentication Options to use AppID and Secret from Provider Settings
